name: Essence of Vietnam
description: A great triip, that has been one of the best selling for 2016 and we continue offer such a perfect trip for 2017 too/ This is an exploring vacation that allow travelers to visit through all the exciting panoramic view of northern Vietnam from Hanoi to Mai Chau valley visiting ethnic minorities to gigantic UNESCO heritage site of Halong Bay for having a unique and amazing experience while stay on board the Halong Bay Cruise for an overnight. Next we flight to Danang from where a journey of discovery takes you to visit ancient Hoi An with plenty of touring idea for you to experience.
